name: Centurion Aviation Services, LLC
about: Centurion Aviation Services, LLC is a full-service flight training company based in Racine, Wisconsin. Located at the Batten International Airport (KRAC), we offer comprehensive pilot training programs for private and commercial pilots. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training to ensure students achieve their aviation goals. We specialize in Private Pilot and Commercial Pilot training, using state-of-the-art facilities and equipment. With a commitment to safety and excellence, Centurion Aviation Services is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots take to the skies with confidence. Whether you're a beginner or advancing your aviation career, we are here to support your journey.
